about_the_game:
Dive into a strange and mesmerizing world where gravity is unpredictable and the laws of physics are constantly defied.

Out of this world


Matter is a first-person parkour game that will plunge you into an unknown and mysterious dimension. You will need to use your agility and wits to overcome obstacles and discover the secrets of a strange reality.

The action takes place in a world that is both fascinating and strange. You will need to explore this universe in search of answers, but be careful not to get lost in its twists and turns.

Altered senses


Gravity is a central element of Matter. It is unpredictable and can change at any moment. You will need to adapt to these changes to avoid falling into the void...

Matter is an intense and fast-paced action-adventure game. You will need to overcome increasingly difficult obstacles to progress. The adventure is interspersed with short puzzles that will require you to use several of your senses. Don't worry, the journey remains very accessible, anyone can make it through.

Features


    - A thrilling 30-minute adventure
    - A platform game with a pleasant and serene atmosphere
    - Disorienting and exotic landscapes
    - A relaxing, dynamic, and disorienting soundtrack
    - No violence
    - No competition
    - Just fun!

Important note: Please be advised that due to camera rotations and constantly altered perception, details may appear rapidly on screen and your sense of balance may be severely disrupted. For anyone who has ever experienced photosensitive epilepsy or motion sickness, it is not recommended to purchase or play this game as the risk of causing these episodes is real.

Credits


Game Design, Programming & Publishing by
    @MatoLabu

Music, Sound & Tech Art by
    @Tomavatars member of Concrete Games

2D & 3D Graphics by
    Monf

Game Design, Level Building, VFX & Programming by

short_description: Dive into a mystical world where gravity crumbles and landscapes transform. Matter is a dreamlike platformer, a contemplative and abstract journey. Explore a strange universe in 30 minutes of serene parkour, where matter and sound harmonize with your actions. A unique sensory experience awaits!
